name: stock_get_annual_avg_div_rate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetches the annual average dividend rate for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\"AAPL\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

region.description:
One of the following is allowed
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S
